content: reversible mood octopus crochet pattern materials 2 colors of yarn a crochet hook some stuffing a yarn needle safety eyes i used 6 mm some black yarn for face details this pattern is written in us crochet terms abbreviations single_crochet single_crochet increase increase crochet 2 single_crochet into the same stitch the amount of stitches you should have after every round is at the end of every step you will need to make 2 bodies and 16 tentacles you will need a body and 8 tentacles in both of your chosen yarn colors this is a good project for anyone who is just starting to learn amigurumi the assembly may get a little complicated but you can do it body make 2 one in each color 1 magic_ring 6 single_crochet 6 2 6 increase 12 3 1sc 1inc 6 times 18 4 2sc 1 increase 6 times 24 5 3sc 1 increase 6 times 30 6 4sc 1 increase 6 times 36 7 5sc 1 increase 6 times 42 8 single_crochet all the way around 42 9 6sc 1 increase 6 times 48 10 single_crochet all the way around 48 11 7sc 1 increase 6 times 54 12 21 single_crochet all the way around 54 finish off tentacles make 16 8 in each color 1 chain 7 2 starting in the second chain from hook single_crochet 6 in one side and single_crochet 6 in the other side as well you will have to crochet into one stitch twice 12 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet 4 increase single_crochet 2 increase sc4 14 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet 5 increase sc2 increase single_crochet 5 16 5 single_crochet all the way around 16 finish off leave long tails for assembly by crochetingdummy assembly read the whole thing before doing it there are 2 methods 1 add the safety eyes to both of your octopus bodies and use the black yarn to give them the desired facial expression i did one sad and the other one happy but the possibilities are endless here 2 now you will need to sew all 8 tentacles to the matching body all in color a using the long tails you left to space them evenly i always put 2 tentacles on opposite sides of the octopus body i first put on 4 in kind of an + pattern and then i sewed the other tentacles in the spaces between make sure the threads are secure and no knots will unravel anytime soon 3 next do the same as 2 with the other octopus half you need to make sure that the spacing is the same as on the other one and that the octopus faces face the same way 4 now you need to sew both octopus halves together make sure
